name: Scheduled database maintenance [DOWNTIME REQUIRED]
content:
We're going to upgrade our databases with a follower changeover strategy.

During this period of time the Content Management API, Content Delivery API and projects administrative interface will be completely unavailable.

Graphql requests requested in our CDN will continue to work.

The actual maintenance impact should be contained to 15 minutes starting from 2022-11-12T16:00:00Z (UTC).

updates.content: Maintenance will be executed at scheduled time.
Maintenance is in progress. Downtime is expected.
Maintenance done. We are perfoming some checks now.
